name: brackets-php-beautify
title: Brackets PHP-Beautify
description: Simple install-and-use code formatter (beautifier) PHP in Brackets. No extra configuration need, no PHP required

scripts.zip: npm run-script build && ./node_modules/.bin/bestzip brackets-php-beautify.zip lib/* thirdparty/* main.js requirejs-config.json package.json
scripts.build: npm run-script lint && npm run-script transpile

author: nadchif
